youWin2: Congratulations, you have caught this Pokémon!
youLose2: Oh no, the Pokemon ran away!
comeBack: Come back tomorrow to discover a new wild Pokémon.
inspiredBy2: and the <1>Pokémon</1> video game series (by Game Freak).
concept1: This game mixes the concept of <1>Who's that Pokémon?</1>
concept3: Everyday, you will randomly encounter a wild Pokémon. You have 5 lives <1></1> to guess who that Pokémon is.
concept4: For each try, you propose a letter. If that letter is contained in Pokemon's name, then all occurences of that letter are revealed.
concept5: However, if Pokémon's name does not contain that letter, you lose a life <1></1>.
concept6: Fully reveal the name of the Pokémon before losing your lives <1></1> to win.
footer: Game developed by Sébastien Cayet - Based on PokeApi
